mapper.sql: RID, IDC_COUNT, ROOM_COUNT, BUSSY_COUNT, AC_ONLINE, AC_OFFLINE, AF_ONLINE, AF_OFFLINE, STA_ONLINE, STA_OFFLINE, NO_CASE, MONTH_EVENT, MONTH_DEALT, MONTH_NOT_DEAL, CLOSED_COUNT, NEED_CLOSE_COUNT, RECTIFY_COUNT, NEED_RECTIFY_COUNT, KEY_020, KEY_030, KEY_010, KEY_040, KEY_050, KEY_060, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, CREATTIME

RID, IDC_COUNT, ROOM_COUNT, BUSSY_COUNT, AC_ONLINE, AC_OFFLINE, AF_ONLINE, AF_OFFLINE, STA_ONLINE, STA_OFFLINE, NO_CASE, MONTH_EVENT, MONTH_DEALT, MONTH_NOT_DEAL, CLOSED_COUNT, NEED_CLOSE_COUNT, RECTIFY_COUNT, NEED_RECTIFY_COUNT, KEY_020, KEY_030, KEY_010, KEY_040, KEY_050, KEY_060, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, CREATTIME
mapper.select:
select IDC_COUNT, ROOM_COUNT, BUSSY_COUNT, AC_ONLINE, AC_OFFLINE, AF_ONLINE, AF_OFFLINE, STA_ONLINE, STA_OFFLINE, NO_CASE, MONTH_EVENT, MONTH_DEALT, MONTH_NOT_DEAL, CLOSED_COUNT, NEED_CLOSE_COUNT, RECTIFY_COUNT, NEED_RECTIFY_COUNT, KEY_020, KEY_030, KEY_010, KEY_040, KEY_050, KEY_060 from SMMS_BASE_STAT
RECORDSTATE='0'
mapper.update: update SMMS_BASE_STAT set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert:
insert into SMMS_BASE_STAT ( RID, IDC_COUNT, ROOM_COUNT, BUSSY_COUNT, AC_ONLINE, AC_OFFLINE, AF_ONLINE, AF_OFFLINE, STA_ONLINE, STA_OFFLINE, NO_CASE, MONTH_EVENT, MONTH_DEALT, MONTH_NOT_DEAL, CLOSED_COUNT, NEED_CLOSE_COUNT, RECTIFY_COUNT, NEED_RECTIFY_COUNT,
KEY_020, KEY_030, KEY_010, KEY_040, KEY_050, KEY_060, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, CREATTIME) values ( #{RID}, #{IDC_COUNT}, #{ROOM_COUNT}, #{BUSSY_COUNT}, #{AC_ONLINE}, #{AC_OFFLINE}, #{AF_ONLINE}, #{AF_OFFLINE}, #{STA_ONLINE}, #{STA_OFFLINE}, #{NO_CASE}, #{MONTH_EVENT}, #{MONTH_DEALT}, #{MONTH_NOT_DEAL}, #{CLOSED_COUNT}, #{NEED_CLOSE_COUNT}, #{RECTIFY_COUNT}, #{NEED_RECTIFY_COUNT}, #{KEY_020}, #{KEY_030}, #{KEY_010}, #{KEY_040}, #{KEY_050}, #{KEY_060}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{RECORDSTATE}, #{CREATTIME})
